video.title: Nurse Jackie
video.synopsis: A flawed but dedicated ER nurse works in a New York City hospital and relies on pain meds to get through exhausting days in this Emmy-winning show.

episodes.synopsis: Jackie takes matters into her own hands following a patient's death, and tries to conceal an affair with a pharmacist who's feeding her drug habit.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Jackie and Kevin become concerned that their older daughter is suffering from anxiety disorder.
episodes.title: Sweet'N All

episodes.synopsis: An elderly patient checks on who has been treating his heart disease with chicken soup; Jackie discusses her daughter's anxiety with Dr. O'Hara.
episodes.title: Chicken Soup

episodes.synopsis: Jackie and Kevin consider enrolling Grace in private school; the stoic Dr. O'Hara must endure the emotional thanks of a boy whose brother she saved.
episodes.title: School Nurse

episodes.synopsis: Jackie breaks several rules and regulations to help a 10-year-old girl caring for her lupus-stricken mother.
episodes.title: Daffodil

episodes.synopsis: A fellow nurse and old friend of Jackie's checks into the hospital with terminal lung cancer and asks Jackie to help end her life.
episodes.title: Tiny Bubbles

episodes.synopsis: A man is admitted to the ER with a steak knife in his chest, after an attack by the ex-husband of a woman he was dating for the first time.
episodes.title: Steak Knife

episodes.synopsis: Jackie discovers that a new temp nurse is abusing drugs, but when she confronts him, he calls Jackie on her hypocrisy.
episodes.title: Pupil

episodes.synopsis: Jackie admits a dying patient she has treated before, learns that O'Hara betrayed her secrets to a sister in Paris and suffers a nosebleed.
episodes.title: Nosebleed

episodes.synopsis: Jackie makes an unusual ploy to get Coop off her back about the fake organ donor card; Jackie begins mother-daughter dance lessons with Grace.
episodes.title: Ring Finger

episodes.synopsis: Eddie is replaced by an automatic pill dispensing machine; Zoey administers the wrong dose of a painkiller to a movie critic.
episodes.title: Pill-O-Matix

episodes.synopsis: Kevin invites Jackie to a midnight rendezvous in order to give her a new wedding ring.
episodes.title: Health Care and Cinema

episodes.synopsis: Jackie rejects Eddie and tries to recommit to her family, but Eddie's overdose threatens to drive her over the edge.
episodes.title: Comfort Food

episodes.synopsis: Jackie covers for a hung over and grieving Dr. O'Hara; Eddie continues his secret friendship with Kevin.
episodes.title: Twitter

episodes.synopsis: Both Jackie and Kevin continue to struggle financially but reject Dr. O'Hara's offer of a loan.
episodes.title: Candyland

episodes.synopsis: Jackie dispenses illegal medical marijuana to a patient suffering from chemotherapy nausea.
episodes.title: Apple Bong

episodes.synopsis: Dr. O'Hara is dumped by Sam and reveals a longtime affair with a foreign correspondent.
episodes.title: Caregiver

episodes.synopsis: Jackie sleeps with Eddie again but asks him to stop his friendship with Kevin, a request Eddie ignores.
episodes.title: Bleeding

episodes.synopsis: The hospital's biggest donor is insulted by Coop but dies before she can keep her promise to withdraw her support.
episodes.title: Silly String

episodes.synopsis: Coop sets up his friend with Eddie, who takes her to Kevin's bar; Grace attends her first session with a psychiatrist.
episodes.title: Monkey Bits

episodes.synopsis: Jackie sets up a post office box to receive bills for the secret credit card she's using to buy drugs.
episodes.title: P.O. Box

episodes.synopsis: Jackie fakes an MRI result to get a phony prescription from Dr. O'Hara, but her deception is discovered.
episodes.title: Sleeping Dogs

episodes.synopsis: A family vacation unravels when Jackie loses her stash of pills and confesses to Kevin that she took Dr. O'Hara's loan.
episodes.title: What the Day Brings

episodes.synopsis: Jackie returns to work, where she can't avoid confrontations with her drug dealer and her illicit lover.
episodes.title: Years of Service

episodes.synopsis: Jackie's marriage is strained, as is her relationship with O'Hara after the intervention.
episodes.title: Game On

episodes.synopsis: Eddie tells Jackie that he now considers Kevin a real friend and can no longer lie to him.
episodes.title: Enough Rope

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's younger sister Tunie visits after a breakup with her boyfriend; Lenny prepares a surprise romantic picnic for Zoey.
episodes.title: Play Me

episodes.synopsis: Jackie finds a new hiding place for her pills and buries the hatchet with O'Hara, who becomes ER chief.
episodes.title: Mitten

episodes.synopsis: Jackie panics when her stash of pills from Bill the epileptic drug dealer runs low; Coop decides to fight O'Hara for the ER chief position.
episodes.title: Rat Falls

episodes.synopsis: Charismatic new nurse Kelly Slater rubs Jackie the wrong way; Eddie confesses that he plans to ask Tunie out on a date.
episodes.title: When the Saints Go

episodes.synopsis: Kelly continues to win over the All Saints staff, including Akalitus; Kevin finds one of Jackie's stashes in a dental floss dispenser.
episodes.title: Orchids & Salami

episodes.synopsis: Jackie accuses Kelly of being inappropriate with two flirty high school girls; Coop begins to let go of childish things.
episodes.title: The Astonishing

episodes.synopsis: Out of pills and jonesing for a high, Jackie is confronted about the missing drugs from Oncology.
episodes.title: Have You Met Miss Jones?

episodes.synopsis: Grace asks her psychologist to be put on medication; Jackie is placed on probation over the drugs she stole from Oncology.
episodes.title: F*ck the Lemurs

episodes.synopsis: O'Hara agrees to help Jackie dose down under her supervision; Kevin is evasive and edgy with both his wife and Eddie.
episodes.title: Batting Practice

episodes.synopsis: Jackie dodges Akalitus's request for a urine sample and forgets to order a cake for Coop's wedding.
episodes.title: ...Deaf Blind Tumor Pee-Test...

episodes.synopsis: All Saints has been purchased by the multinational corporation Quantum Bay. The new director, Mike Cruz, arrives with a lengthy to-do list.
episodes.title: Kettle-Kettle-Black-Black

episodes.synopsis: Jackie detoxes in rehab and begins attending group therapy. Meanwhile, back at All Saints, Akalitus is in scrubs and on the floor as a nurse.
episodes.title: Disneyland Sucks

episodes.synopsis: Worried about Grace, Jackie leaves rehab early and returns to a very different All Saints. Zoey has second thoughts about her relationship with Lenny.
episodes.title: The Wall

episodes.synopsis: Jackie, blindsided when Grace reveals she knows about rehab, goes to Kevin's to make sure he knows everything before hearing it from someone else.
episodes.title: Slow Growing Monsters

episodes.synopsis: Zoey wants to move out of her mother's place and starts looking for a roommate. As Jackie waits for Kevin at a café, a man serves her divorce papers.
episodes.title: One-Armed Jacks

episodes.synopsis: Kevin, suing for full custody, prompts O'Hara to take action on Jackie's behalf. Zoey gets engaged to Lenny but then loses her ring.
episodes.title: No-Kimono-Zone

episodes.synopsis: Jackie meets her high-powered divorce lawyer and is told to play hardball with Kevin if she wants to keep her kids. Cruz has a panic attack at work.
episodes.title: Day of the Iguana

episodes.synopsis: Jackie comes clean to Cruz about rehab while they tend to an intoxicated Charlie. Following Zoey's break-up, Lenny announces he is heading to Europe.
episodes.title: Chaud & Froid

episodes.synopsis: Jackie is upset that Eddie and Akalitus have been fired from All Saints. O'Hara vents to Jackie and has a breakdown over Coop and her pregnancy.
episodes.title: Are Those Feathers?

episodes.synopsis: Upset that Jackie called in nurse temps without his permission, Cruz fires Jackie. Coop learns who O'Hara's donor is but keeps it a secret.
episodes.title: Handle Your Scandal

episodes.synopsis: Jackie asks Kevin for a birthday gift. Two very different new doctors join the ER staff. Eddie gets a break. O'Hara shares some news.
episodes.title: Happy F**king Birthday

episodes.synopsis: Jackie locks horns with Kevin over custody. Later, she takes advantage of a forgetful Akalitus, and prevents an angry Coop from making a rash move.
episodes.title: Luck of the Drawing

episodes.synopsis: An accident Jackie is involved in elicits an accusation and, later, an invitation. Coop covers for Carrie, but Jackie benefits from her ignorance.
episodes.title: Smile

episodes.synopsis: Zoey must identify a drugged woman brought to the ER. Both of Jackie's daughters give cause for concern. Coop succumbs to his attraction to Carrie.
episodes.title: Lost Girls

episodes.synopsis: Jackie gets first-date jitters. Despite her memory lapses, Akalitus proves to be invaluable. Later on, Jackie receives calls from two people in need.
episodes.title: Good Thing

episodes.synopsis: Carrie is forced to deal with a foul patient. Cruz and Jackie have a heartfelt talk. A drunken outburst helps to diagnose an easily missed condition.
episodes.title: Walk of Shame

episodes.synopsis: Akalitus's forgetfulness leads to a mess. Zoey calls out Prentiss on his poor bedside manner. A serious misdiagnosis convinces Coop to mentor Carrie.
episodes.title: Teachable Moments

episodes.synopsis: Kevin comes by the house at an inopportune moment, worrying Frank. The mystery behind Akalitus's memory lapses is solved. Jackie checks up on Grace.
episodes.title: Forget It

episodes.synopsis: Grace gets a scared-straight tour of the ER. Zoey's feelings are hurt, but she finds comfort elsewhere. Jackie and Kevin resolve their custody issue.
episodes.title: Heart

episodes.synopsis: When Zoey learns Grace isn't attending Jackie's sobriety celebration, she intervenes. Thor bonds with a patient. Carrie undergoes a peer review.
episodes.title: Soul

episodes.synopsis: Jackie gets more than exercise at the gym, and later finds an unconventional 12-step sponsor. At the hospital, she is tasked with shadowing Carrie.
episodes.title: Sink or Swim

episodes.synopsis: Desperate for a source, Jackie finds one at the ER and another while on a date with Frank. Coop's online dating profile leads to an odd recruitment.
episodes.title: Pillgrimage

episodes.synopsis: Coop gets some disappointing news. Carrie becomes a local TV star. Jackie creates some drama to help a patient. Grace drops a bombshell.
episodes.title: Super Greens

episodes.synopsis: Mia sparks jealousy in Jackie. Zoey helps Prentiss deliver bad news to an old pal. Frank reveals why his marriage ended. Jackie is caught in the act.
episodes.title: Love Jungle

episodes.synopsis: Frank searches for Jackie's stash. Jackie connects with an unlikely patient. Prentiss gets his groove back. Kevin and Mia make an announcement.
episodes.title: Rag & Bone

episodes.synopsis: Down to her last bag of pills, Jackie learns that her fake ID has been compromised. While on a date with Prentiss, Zoe senses something is amiss.
episodes.title: Nancy Wood

episodes.synopsis: Antoinette makes a confession. Jackie asks Eddie for a favor. Coop reaches a milestone. Grace delivers a school speech that's hard for Jackie to hear.
episodes.title: Rat on a Cheeto

episodes.synopsis: Frank, Eddie and Antoinette help Jackie detox at home. While detoxing, Jackie dreams of her worst fear, and later has a realization about Frank.
episodes.title: The Lady with the Lamp

episodes.synopsis: Frank warns Jackie that the DEA is going to investigate her hospital. The nun returns to the ER, worse than ever. Jackie brushes off Antoinette.
episodes.title: Candyman

episodes.synopsis: In order to keep using, Jackie retreats from those closest to her. Carrie forgets an important date but Thor saves the day. The DEA targets a suspect.
episodes.title: Sidecars and Spermicide

episodes.synopsis: Jackie uses Helen, the dying nun, for her own purposes, and later brings a poor choice of a guest to the wedding. Zoey's worst fears are confirmed.
episodes.title: Sisterhood

episodes.synopsis: Running out of options, Jackie pins blame for her nearly fatal error on another ER staff member. Carrie shares some news with Coop.
episodes.title: Flight

episodes.synopsis: Jackie finds herself in a holding cell, where she suffers from withdrawal symptoms. Coop wants to take his relationship with Carrie to the next level.
episodes.title: Clean

episodes.synopsis: When Jackie runs into a financial roadblock in her plan to get her job back, she takes radical action. Later, she gains leverage against Kevin.
episodes.title: Deal

episodes.synopsis: Jackie and her colleagues struggle with her new work limits. Zoey is put in an awkward position. Akalitus comes down hard on Eddie.
episodes.title: Godfathering

episodes.synopsis: Carrie prompts Coop to make a life-changing decision. Zoey draws a line with Akalitus. Meanwhile, Eddie gets a job and Jackie loses an income source.
episodes.title: Nice Ladies

episodes.synopsis: Jackie finds another outlet for her leadership skills and receives an unexpected offer. The ER gets a new doctor, who throws a memorable staff party.
episodes.title: Coop Out

episodes.synopsis: Jackie plays both sides in the hospital's battle against the developers. When Zoey and Thor initiate a walkout, Akalitus is forced to relax her rules.
episodes.title: High Noon

episodes.synopsis: Jackie takes steps to put her kids first. While Akalitus opens up to Dr. Prince over a long lunch, Zoey and Carrie bond in a more unconventional way.
episodes.title: Are You with Me, Doctor Wu?

episodes.synopsis: Thor makes an announcement. Zoey and Carrie host an impromptu bash in the soon-to-close chapel. Dr. Prince is troubled by a patient's decision.
episodes.title: Managed Care

episodes.synopsis: Jackie and Zoe intercept Grace from running off to a surprising destination. Akalitus discovers Jackie's deal. Zoey makes a tearful confession.
episodes.title: Serviam in Caritate

episodes.synopsis: Unusual circumstances put Jackie at risk of failing her drug test. Later, things get ugly at her license hearing when Akalitus voices her concerns.
episodes.title: Jackie and the Wolfe

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Prince exhibits strange behavior, forcing Jackie to intervene and seek the help of Akalitus. After a secret is leaked, Carrie gets revenge.
episodes.title: Vigilante Jones

episodes.synopsis: Jackie has a visitor from her past. Dr. Prince makes a final heroic move. Eddie's employer finds criminal evidence. Zoey makes a difficult decision.
episodes.title: I Say a Little Prayer
